1329970.name: Fantasy Grounds - Jans Tokenpack 16 - Ancient Greek Heroes
1329970.description:
Jans Tokenpack 16 - Ancient Greek Heroes

There are few time periods that have produced more heroes than Ancient Greece. These heroes went on amazing adventures.
  • Achilles and Odysseus in the battle of Troy and the Trojan Horse.
  • Odysseus on his great Odyssey meeting with Cyclopses, Wtiches, and Sirens.
  • Theseus of Minos that slayed the Minotaur in the maze.
  • Jason and the Argonauts, searching for the Golden Fleece.
  • Perseus that killed the gorgon, Medusa.
  • The fierce tribe of warrior women named the Amazons.
  • These stories have been great inspiration for roleplaying game adventures.
Playing a game in a Ancient Greek themed period, brings a very interesting feeling to your tabletop rpg. The kingsdoms are small, and the world is mostly untamed and uncivilized. Traveling is dangerous, and only done by adventurers that most people deem crazy. Myths and stories are spread from mouth to mouth, and the interacting with Gods and Goddesses is an every day affair. All of this set in a Mediterranean climate with warm summers and mild winters.
This token pack contains 60 tokens. Including:
  • Hoplites with spear or sword
  • Amazon warriors with spear, sword, and bow
  • Slingers carrying leather straps to sling their stones with incredible accuracy
  • Archers
  • Bards carrying a hand harp (lyre) or a double flute
  • Spellcasters carrying their staves
  • Hooded rogues with a dagger and/or a shortsword
I hope you use this pack to go on great heroic adventures!
Converted by:  
Jan Loos
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
